nodes.excerpt: Take a Walk lets you take virtual walks around the world, filtering by country, time of day and weather. Enjoy the sigths of cities all around the world, and relax with the sounds that they have to offer!
nodes.title: Take a Walk - Relax, in your favorite places on earth

nodes.excerpt: OpenReel empowers distributed enterprise, media, entertainment, and agency teams to remotely control, direct, script, film, and collaborate on high definition video projects from a mobile device or webcam in over 125 countries
nodes.title: OpenReel - Simple remote video production
nodes.author: Gabe Perez

nodes.excerpt: Ubacast helps creators host, securely stream videos and get paid through: - video channel donations, - video support donations, - video pay per view. Not all creators can earn a living from Ads on YouTube. Think of Ubacast as a Patreon for video creators.
nodes.title: Ubacast - Video streaming and monetization. Patreon for video creators
nodes.author: Sebastien Peterson

nodes.excerpt: Zealous lets any creator: - Create a home page for all their live activity - Build a mailing list of their true fans - Engage in realtime with fans via live rooms - Monetize through tips, tickets, and subscriptions Join our live Q&A! https://community.zealous.space/r/4ckvmy http://bit.ly/zealous-qa
nodes.title: Zealous - VIP live streams for your true fans
nodes.author: Ken Yeung

nodes.excerpt: Hyper is an animoji voice chat app for gamers & anime fans. Meet people and voice chat, without the anxiety of revealing your real face. We give you tools to draw, voice chat, and more. The more time you spend, the more coins you earn for new characters.
nodes.title: Hyper Online - Animoji social network for people into games and anime.
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: With Multistream Studio you can simultaneously broadcast to multiple live video services while using your favourite app (like OBS or Zoom), video camera, hardware encoder or mobile phone. It acts like a middleman copying your stream to multiple destinations.
nodes.title: Multistream Studio - Broadcast to multiple video services from any software
nodes.author: Alex Denk

nodes.excerpt: Prop Hero is an interactive gaming platform that allows fans of live sports to compete in the action by correctly predicting what is going to happen while they watch. Prop Hero can be embedded into broadcast streams or used as a second screen experience.
nodes.title: Prop Hero - Interactive predictor games for live sports
